mapper.insert: insert into score (cafeName, detailName, menuName, uid, score) values (#{cafeName}, #{detailName}, #{menuName}, #{uid}, #{score})
mapper.delete: delete from score where cafeName=#{cafeName} and detailName=#{detailName} and menuName=#{menuName} and uid=#{uid}
mapper.update: update score set score=#{score} where cafeName=#{cafeName} and detailName=#{detailName} and menuName=#{menuName} and uid=#{uid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from score where cafeName=#{cafeName} and detailName=#{detailName} and menuName=#{menuName} and uid=#{uid}
select avg(score) from score where cafeName=#{cafeName} and detailName=#{detailName} and menuName=#{menuName}
